data.title: Thunderbird Entertainment
data.text: Thunderbird Entertainment Group is a global award-winning, full-service multiplatform production, distribution and rights management company, headquartered in Vancouver, with additional offices in Los Angeles, Toronto, and Ottawa. We create award-winning scripted, unscripted, and animated programming for the worldâ€™s leading digital platforms, as well as Canadian and international broadcasters. Our vision is to produce high quality, socially responsible content that makes the world a better place. Through Thunderbird Kids and Family (Atomic Cartoons), and Thunderbird Factual (Great Pacific Media) and Thunderbird Scripted, we develop, produce, and distribute animated, factual, and scripted content. Thunderbird also has a division dedicated to global distribution and consumer products.
